title: Infrastructure Delays1
description: Delays in construction or facility setup may push back the school opening date.

title: Lack of Qualified Staff
description: It may be difficult to attract certified teachers and administrators in a new region.

title: Low Community Engagement
description: Limited support from local families could affect enrollment and outreach.

title: Regulatory Approval Delays
description: Government approvals or licenses may take longer than expected.

title: Budget Overruns
description: Costs may exceed budget due to unexpected infrastructure or staffing expenses.
